A free dating game for Windows, Mac and Linux.

Please note this is my first ever game I've fully developed and there are bound to be a few but I really wanted to get this game out on valentines day because I've (lazily) spent a year developing.  There are currently a few endings and the game was programmed by me and all  the original concept art and pbc's current sprite was by a good friend who currently does not have any social outlets.

I will be acitvely releasing updates to this game for a while, so any bugs you encounter (you will, I know but hopefully not game breaking) please report them in the comment section.

Thank you for downloading this game

P.S this game is liscened under creative commons but I'd appreciate you telling me first if you plan to use the characters!
